sample.rm:
com.mysql.jdbc.exceptions.jdbc4.MySQLNonTransientConnectionException: Cannot connect to MySQL server on localhost:3306.
Make sure that there is a MySQL server running on the machine/port you are trying to connect to and that the machine this software is running on is able to connect to this host/port (i.e. not firewalled). Also make sure that the server has not been started with the --skip-networking flag.
sample.samplerData: [Prepared Update Statement] INSERT INTO test (registro_id, n_listas) VALUES (?,?) 897,897 INTEGER,INTEGER
